extDescription.message: Display the lyrics of any song on YouTube™.

pageActionTitle.description: Text in small popup when you hover the page action icon

loadingMessage.description: Message when a lyrics is loading

copyrightInfo.message: Lyrics are property and copyright of their owners.
copyrightInfo.description: First line of the copyright text after the lyrics

copyrightCourtesy.description: Second line of the copyright with a link to azlyrics

notFound.description: Message shown when no lyrics was found

notFoundHelp.message: Please enter the song's title and artist (i.e. "Born this way - Lady Gaga") and hit return:
notFoundHelp.description: Show a hint when no lyrics were found
